purpose: To present an overview of fraud management metrics.
title: Overview of Fraud Management Metrics
reasoning_strategy: Definition of key fraud management metrics to emphasize their importance.
cta: It is important to not only focus on these metrics. The key to a successful Fraud Operating Model is balancing fraud risk and the customer experience.

tables.title: Fraud Management Metrics
tables.description: Defines various metrics used in fraud management.

cells: Number of detected fraudulent transactions during the fraud cycle, divided by the total number of fraudulent transactions
Number of fraudulent accounts with at least one detected transaction occurring during the fraud cycle, divided by the total number of fraudulent accounts
Amount of detected fraudulent transactions, divided by the total amount of fraudulent transactions
Ratio of genuine transactions to fraudulent transactions by threshold
Ratio of genuine accounts to fraudulent accounts by threshold
Ratio of genuine dollars to fraud dollars by threshold
Average daily percentage of all accounts that are alerted at a given threshold
